author: sproul
content:
To clarify, Teku's beacon node will _serve_ data on /v2/ prior to the fork, but the Teku validator client won't start querying it until the fork activates?

It seems that Infura still hasn't exposed the /v2/ URLs on Pyrmont, which means the current Lighthouse v1.5.0-rc.1 validator client doesn't work with Infura

author: ajsutton
content: No Teku will use the v2 api if Altair is scheduled for the network. So it would be using it for Pyrmont now.  I'll have to follow up with Infura to see what's happening with those APIs.
